> 
> What is a chaka monkey?

It's a monkey named Chaka.........................

> 
> What is a chaka monkey?

![NUHwZ4.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img673/7784/NUHwZ4.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T20:54:25Z" title="06/22/2015 08:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by YANFRET**

> 
> It's a monkey named Chaka.........................

Or...is it a chaka named Monkey! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) jk

> 
> What is a chaka monkey?

Anyone here ever seen Land of the Lost with Will Farrel? I love that stupid movie. Everytime i see this thread im reminded of this guy.

![26337930_.jpg](http://content.internetvideoarchive.com/content/photos/6270/26337930_.jpg)

> 
> Anyone here ever seen Land of the Lost with Will Farrel? I love that stupid movie. Everytime i see this thread im reminded of this guy.
> [http://content.internetvideoarchive.com/content/photos/6270/26337930_.jpg](http://content.internetvideoarchive.com/content/photos/6270/26337930_.jpg)

We have a winner! Our little Chaka was named after that Chaka when we rescued him from the Colombian jungle back in 2010.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0JXwzlRcYWk?start=96&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T01:46:17Z" title="06/23/2015 01:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by YANFRET**
Lmao! I had a feeling. Shall we sing some showtunes?

Okay, maybe I'll take a break from the Moho spacecraft. I've got an Orion that can do the round trip but getting anything bigger is a challenge that I haven't managed to beat yet. Maybe I'll go back to Jool for a while, that'll be easy by comparison...

We'll See you there!

![IKzAhG.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img661/5659/IKzAhG.jpg)

> 
> Anyone here ever seen Land of the Lost with Will Farrel? I love that stupid movie. Everytime i see this thread im reminded of this guy.
> [http://content.internetvideoarchive.com/content/photos/6270/26337930_.jpg](http://content.internetvideoarchive.com/content/photos/6270/26337930_.jpg)

Err... Uhm... you mean the Will Farrel remake of the 1974 TV show?

![chaka-in-land-of-the-lost1.jpg?w=245&h=317](https://goremasternews.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/chaka-in-land-of-the-lost1.jpg?w=245&h=317)

> 
> We'll See you there!
> [http://imageshack.com/a/img661/5659/IKzAhG.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img661/5659/IKzAhG.jpg)

That's just beautiful...

P.S. Why do I suddenly have the desire to rename one of my mods to "SLEESTAK"?

![6300931929_68fe04191c_b.jpg](https://c1.staticflickr.com/7/6042/6300931929_68fe04191c_b.jpg)

....Yesss but you see Chaka (the monkey) thinks that Chaka from the original show is ugly, and we really just liked the Chaka from the movie not the show, because of his playful mischief

In fact if you show Chaka too many pictures of 1970's Chaka it is very likely that he will poo on his paw and throw it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-24T03:10:22Z" title="06/24/2015 03:10  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 24, 2015</time> by YANFRET**

**Chaka Vall Upper Stage**

Featuring Monkey Cryo Unit **TM** for preventing propellant boil off during the three year transit to Jool

![elOjDr.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img633/4170/elOjDr.jpg)

More later
PLEASE add this mod to CKAN.... CKAN makes it soooo easy to keep mods updated. Saludos desde panama parse

Ã¢â€“Â² Okay I'l check on that.

**News**

Ã¢â„¢Â¦ Your 1.0.4 update is almost ready

Ã¢â„¢Â¦ A new class of launch vehicle, the "Exploration Launch System" will enable monkey exploration anywhere in the solar system with very few visits to the pad.

**XLS: Chaka Transfer Lander** 

- Pre position in orbit of desired target.

- Dock and with XLS: Chaka Transfer Vehicle at destination and transfer crew

- Lander supports inital landing and return to orbit

- Upper stage has surplus propellant relative to Transfer Vehicle (more on that later)

- New NTR engine config

- 5800 M/S available from inital 1000 km Kerbin orbit. 

![cbF05y.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img540/7125/cbF05y.jpg)

![dMa0jv.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img537/1382/dMa0jv.jpg)

![YPqPpa.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img633/5571/YPqPpa.jpg)

![qGoOCJ.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img538/448/qGoOCJ.jpg)

**Bonus:**

"XLS - Technical 2x" - 5000 m/s from 600 km initial launch orbit

![ew4WOh.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img661/3940/ew4WOh.jpg)

hi

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/5ABGP)

the clamps are still derping in 1.0.4, so I had to make two other launches, the first one I removed the towers, still had problems with the clamps derping around and blowing my right SRB... the second one was successful though

BTW, it has 12k dV, I might mess around with the stages and maybe make a more economic variant to compete with the XLV... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I had half tank left in the second stage when i decoupled it, S-IVB (with J-2X) was mostly decorative...

@MeCripp

It didnÃ‚Â´t work for me. The same as before.

A second issue: The Windows of the Orion are at the south, the IVA-Sight looks north.

A question: How can i use the Fustek Stationparts along with Chaka? When I copy the Fustek-Folder to GameData i cannot see any parts in the VAB.

And: Is there a Chance to make a IVA for 6 Kerbals for the Orion?

Many Questions, i know.![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-07T05:31:14Z" title="07/07/2015 05:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 7, 2015</time> by YANFRET**

Looks pretty awesome!

I did notice something with the command module though. I realize you are using ASET's internals for the command pod (great choice...best internals in the game), but I did notice that where the windows are in the command pod, and where the windows are in the internals, they are on opposite ends of the ship (i.e. when you make the roll while ascending, instead of looking out into space, you are looking down onto the ground). Is there any way of fixing that, or is that more of an internal/external configuration that cannot be modified.

Cheers, and keep up the fantastic work...your deep exploration pics have got me drooling!
